Container.Name: webtrees
Container.Overview: webtrees is the web's leading on-line collaborative genealogy application. For help configuring the parameters, see https://hub.docker.com/r/nathanvaughn/webtrees An unofficial CA of an unofficial docker image.

Config.Name: PORT
Config.Description: The port used to connect to the web interface

Config.Name: PRETTY_URLS
Config.Description: Setting this to any truthy value (True, 1, yes) will enable pretty URLs. This can be toggled at any time, however you must go through initial setup at least once first. Default value is 'False'

Config.Name: LANG
Config.Description: webtrees localization setting. This takes a locale code. List: https://github.com/fisharebest/webtrees/tree/main/resources/lang/. Default value is 'en-us'

Config.Name: BASE_URL
Config.Description: Base URL of the installation, with protocol. This needs to be in the form of http://webtrees.example.com.

Config.Name: DB_TYPE
Config.Description: Database server type. See below for valid values. Default value is 'mysql'

Config.Name: DB_HOST
Config.Description: Database server host.

Config.Name: DB_PORT
Config.Description: Database server port. Default value is '3306'

Config.Name: DB_USER
Config.Description: Database server username. Default value is 'webtrees'

Config.Name: DB_PASS
Config.Description: Database server password.

Config.Name: DB_NAME
Config.Description: Database name. Default value is 'webtrees'

Config.Name: DB_PREFIX
Config.Description: Prefix to give all tables in the database. Set this to a value of "" to have no table prefix. Default value is 'wt_'

Config.Name: DB_KEY
Config.Description: Key file used to verify the MySQL server. Only use with the mysql database driver. Relative to the /var/www/webtrees/data/ directory.

Config.Name: DB_CERT
Config.Description: Certificate file used to verify the MySQL server. Only use with the mysql database driver. Relative to the /var/www/webtrees/data/ directory.

Config.Name: DB_CA
Config.Description: Certificate authority file used to verify the MySQL server. Only use with the mysql database driver. Relative to the /var/www/webtrees/data/ directory.

Config.Name: DB_VERIFY
Config.Description: Whether to verify the MySQL server. Only use with the mysql database driver. If True, you must also fill out DB_KEY, DB_CERT, and DB_CA. Default value is 'False'

Config.Name: WT_USER
Config.Description: First admin account username. Note, this is only used the first time the container is run, and the database is initialized.

Config.Name: WT_NAME
Config.Description: First admin account full name. Note, this is only used the first time the container is run, and the database is initialized.

Config.Name: WT_PASS
Config.Description: First admin account password. Note, this is only used the first time the container is run, and the database is initialized.

Config.Name: WT_EMAIL
Config.Description: First admin account email. Note, this is only used the first time the container is run, and the database is initialized.

Config.Name: PHP_MEMORY_LIMIT
Config.Description: PHP memory limit. See the PHP documentation. Default value is '1024M'

Config.Name: PHP_MAX_EXECUTION_TIME
Config.Description: PHP max execution time for a request in seconds. See the PHP documentation. Default value is '90'

Config.Name: PHP_POST_MAX_SIZE
Config.Description: PHP POST request max size. See the PHP documentation. Default value is '50M'

Config.Name: PHP_UPLOAD_MAX_FILE_SIZE
Config.Description: PHP max uploaded file size. See the PHP documentation. Default value is '50M'
